ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware
ygData.msgSnippet: I have one gig of ram, a 2.4Ghz processor, two 160 meg hard drives, a GeForce FX 5200 video card, and I m on cable (at twice the speed of DSL). I still have
ygData.messageBody:
I have one gig of ram, a 2.4Ghz processor, two 160 meg hard drives, a
GeForce FX 5200 video card, and I'm on cable (at twice the speed of DSL). I
still have lag in the bazaar and only occassionally have lag in PoK. I'm
willing to bet that a better video card would make for less lag in the
bazaar as opposed to adding more memory and increasing the speed of the
cpu. At least that's the rumor I've heard. Is anyone here using a $300
dollar GeForce instead of what I have? How's the lag in the bazaar?

Edward Fox

At 12:34 PM 8/11/2003 -0400, you wrote:
>For some reason I doubt it. I believe he'd probably still lag in the
>bazaar at certain points of the day. I wonder how much RAM, how much
>video memory, how fast a processor do you need before you DONT lag in the
>bazaar anymore? 3GB of RAM? Over a 3Ghz processor? I knoq pwoplw on DSL
>who still lag in the bazaar so I don't think that has anything to do with
>it. I'm on cable and I lag.
>
>Wulfric
>
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Melanie Johnson
